name: Yoyo
description:
A game made for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2 with the theme rewind.

Made as a solo dev.

Went for 80s inspired art.

Drag the yoyo to throw it.

Drag the string to flick it around

Space to rewind the yoyo before you run out of speed

The project had quite a few issues with game mechanics and due to the limited time I could devote to this ended up being a very stunted prototype.
